scripts.start:dev: webpack serve --progress --config webpack.dev.js --env DOMAIN=v2dev.opensourcebrain.org --env NAMESPACE=osb2dev --env NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=12048'
scripts.start:test: webpack serve --progress --config webpack.dev.js --env DOMAIN=v2.opensourcebrain.org --env NAMESPACE=osb2 --env NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=12048'
scripts.start:minikube: webpack serve --progress --config webpack.dev.js --env DOMAIN=osb.local --env NAMESPACE=osblocal --env NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=12048'
scripts.start:local: webpack serve --progress --config webpack.dev.js --env DOMAIN=v2.opensourcebrain.org --env ACCOUNTS_API_DOMAIN=localhost:5001 --env WORKSPACES_DOMAIN=localhost:5000 --env NAMESPACE=osblocal --env NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=12048'
scripts.start:local-ws: webpack serve --progress --config webpack.dev.js --env DOMAIN=v2.opensourcebrain.org --env ACCOUNTS_API_DOMAIN=localhost:5001 --env WORKSPACES_DOMAIN=localhost:5000 --env NAMESPACE=osblocal --env NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=12048'
scripts.start:local-accounts: webpack serve --progress --config webpack.dev.js --env DOMAIN=v2.opensourcebrain.org --env ACCOUNTS_API_DOMAIN=localhost:5001 --env NAMESPACE=osblocal --env NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=12048'
